### Scolarit√©

```{r}
library(highcharter)
library(tibble)
data <- tibble(label = c("R", "Matlab", "Python","HTML/CSS/JS"), data = c(10, 7, 5, 2))

 highchart() %>% 
 hc_chart(type = "pie") %>% 
 hc_add_series_labels_values(labels = data$label, values = data$data)
```   
 
### Timevis
    
```{r}
library(timevis)

# Template for world cup HTML of each item
templateCode <- function(stage, team1, team2, score1, score2) {
  sprintf(
    '<table><tbody>
      <tr><td colspan="3"><em>%s</em></td></tr>
      <tr>
        <td>%s</td>
        <th>&nbsp;%s - %s&nbsp;</th>
        <td>%s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td><img src="flags/%s.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s"></td>
        <th></th>
        <td><img src="flags/%s.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s"></td>
      </tr>
    </tbody></table>',
    stage, team1, score1, score2, team2, gsub("\\s", "", tolower(team1)),
    team1, gsub("\\s", "", tolower(team2)), team2
  )
}

dataBasic <- data.frame(
  id = 1:6,
  
  
  
  content = c(HTML('Java <br> <img src="www/java.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s">'),
              HTML('Matlab <br> <img src="www/matlab.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s">'), 
              HTML('Python <br> <img src="www/python.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s">'), 
              HTML('Matlab <br> <img src="www/matlab.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s">'), 
              HTML('R <br> <img src="www/R.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s">'),
              HTML('HTML/CSS/Js <br> <img src="www/html.jpg" width="31" height="20" alt="%s">
                   <img src="www/css.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s">
                   <img src="www/js.png" width="31" height="20" alt="%s">')
              ),
  start   = c("2016-01-10", "2017-04-01", "2017-09-01", "2018-04-01", "2018-09-01", "2019-01-01"),
  end    = NA#c("2016-09-01", "2017-10-01", "2018-09-01", "2017-09-01", Sys.Date())
)
 config <- list(
      editable = F,
      align = "center",
      orientation = "top",
      snap = NULL,
      margin = list(item = 30, axis = 50)
    )

    timevis(dataBasic, zoomFactor = 1, options = config)

    
    

```
